Creative London Wedding Photographer

NEW YORK CITY WEDDING PLANNER

Good day - I'm from Ukraine! My name is Roman Savosko, I am a wedding and family photographer, and I shoot various events. At the meeting, I ask each couple the question - what does your wedding mean to you? In response, I hear many versions, but for me, a wedding means the union of two families for the whole day, and my task is to reflect this event.

Roman Savosko - London Wedding Photographer

Creating natural, timeless photos of your special day.
Acclaimed wedding photography in London, throughout the UK and overseas filled with creativity, joy, humour and love Get in touch

As a wedding photographer, I have one simple goal: to take unposed pictures of genuine moments. Moments that will make you laugh, cry and become lost for words as you relive all that took place on your wedding day.

Knowing I’ll be taking care of this allows you to relax, take everything in and love every minute of the day you spent countless hours planning.

I’m a London wedding photographer, but travel across the whole of the UK, and internationally. Whatever or wherever your wedding venue is, a luxury London hotel, an idyllic barn in the Cotswolds or a rustic French château, I’ll capture everything you dreamed of – and more.

There’s no single event that better encapsulates all the emotions we go through than a wedding. Excitement, nerves, relief, elation – it’s all there.

My aim is for you to look back on your wedding photos and remember what actually happened on your big day. Not what was set-up.

Over the years our images have won us many top awards, most recently, UK wedding photographer of the year 2019, 2020, and again in 2021 awarded to us by 'The Wedding Industry Awards' (TWIA) and 'The British Institute of Professional Photography' (BIPP). Liam is also listed as one of the world's best wedding photographers through SLR Lounge and one of the world's best destination wedding photographers through Junebug Weddings. We are a proud recommended artist with 'World's Best Wedding Photos' based in the United States.

If you are a couple looking for one of the best UK Wedding Photographers, a London wedding photographer, international wedding photographer, elopement photographer or engagement photographer who can deliver an incredible set of story telling moments from your wedding day filled with joy and love.

True, Authentie Love

Experience & Knowledge

Take a look through our portfolio below

Having spent two decades in the wedding industry as a wedding photographer in the UK, throughout London and overseas I am confident I have seen it all. I still find it mad to think I have photographed over 900 weddings all over the world for all sorts of different people! I've photographed Jewish weddings, Hindu weddings, Muslim weddings, Sikh weddings, Greek weddings, Chinese weddings church weddings, barn weddings, festival weddings, LGBT weddings ... in fact, I don't think there is a type of wedding out there I haven't photographed!

It's been a crazy journey and over these years I've picked up a heap of knowledge. From the early planning stages, to the day itself and then afterwards, Bee and I have answers and solutions to any situation and are ready to help every step of the way.

I don't see myself as just a wedding photographer on the big day. I know weddings inside out and can sort of become your unofficial planner on the big day itself. Stepping in when you're concerned about anything and steering the ship to make sure everything runs smoothly and on time!

When you book me to photograph your London, UK or overseas wedding you're not just getting an accomplished wedding photographer.

Wedding Photographer London, UK & Destinations
